name: Octavio Alvarez

content.text: @roytang "... users would have to do without many of the bells and whistles we’ve come to expect from modern webapps. i.e. clicking “Refresh” instead of timelines auto-updating..." -  It's not like we could not create an alternative for this; it's more like we steered the whole Web in the wrong direction.
content.html: @roytang "... users would have to do without many of the bells and whistles we’ve come to expect from modern webapps. i.e. clicking “Refresh” instead of timelines auto-updating..." - It's not like we could not create an alternative for this; it's more like we steered the whole Web in the wrong direction.

text: @roytang "... users would have to do without many of the bells and whistles we’ve come to expect from modern webapps. i.e. clicking “Refresh” instead of timelines auto-updating..." - It's not like we could not create an alternative for this; it's more like we steered the whole Web in the wrong direction.
